author: veithen
msg: * Make sure that the test cases only start sending messages when the test server is up and running (avoiding connection refused errors seen on some platforms).
* The fix in revision 695095 also corrects a synchronization issue in MailTransportListener that prevented us from reusing resources between test cases. This has been changed.

author: dennisl
msg: o Use a directory for the stage deploy that is writable on a Unix system.

author: bentmann
msg: o Declared all relevant mailing lists

author: sisbell
msg: Fix: mng3746 - Implemented proper ordering of system, user and model properties used in interpolation. this required creating a tag value, which could be used for comparing and ordering of InterpolatorProperty.
